title: The Path of Fear
description: Young Morgan Elsbeth seeks revenge after losing everything.

title: The Path of Anger
description: Morgan is approached by a potentially powerful ally.

title: The Path of Hate
description: Offered the chance to stand trial for her crimes, Morgan instead seeks her destiny.

title: Devoted
description: Former Jedi Barriss Offee is recruited by the Empire.

title: Realization
description: On a mission to hunt a fugitive, complications change Barriss forever.

title: The Way Out
description: A shadow from Barriss' past catches up with her.
